title: In 12 days covid-19 cases have gone from 1mn to 1.92mn. Where did the USA go wrong? - Quora
tags: History of the United States of America
Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The rate of increase has come down to less than 1:1, That shows things are actually improving! Earlier, doubling used to happen in 3 or 4 days also. Lock Down/Restriction is showing impact.
